title: For Sale:T206 PSA 7 Happy Smith Polar Bear! $1650 **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale:T206 PSA 7 Happy Smith Polar Bear! $1650 **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Scans attached. Almost impossible to find a Polar Bear graded higher than a PSA 6, they are just that scarce....The last PSA 7 common sold for almost $2800 at REA a few months ago. This card is the highest graded, priced to sell quick at $2000....Reduced to only $1800, thanks for the inquiries, OK, let's go $1650....**SOLD**
offered at $1650, extremely low pop card with a tough back...thanks

Polar Bears above a PSA 6 or SGC 80 are quite rare.

Good luck with sale.
